_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY DARKMATTER SERVERS - ANTIMATTERZONE.NET
name: DMS FiveM Server
author: captainpax@antimatterzone.net
description: Standalone FiveM FXServer (DMS Edition) - Full auto-install, auto-update, ESX Legacy ready, and production-optimized. Built by Darkmatter Servers (AntimatterZone).

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

set -euo pipefail

# Prepare basic folder structure
mkdir -p /home/container /home/container/resources /home/container/opt/cfx-server /home/container/logs /home/container/cache
cd /home/container

# Download required DMS stack files
curl -fsSL https://cloud.antimatterzone.net/s/9DzxCAFpSNMok6E/download/entrypoint.sh -o entrypoint.sh
curl -fsSL https://cloud.antimatterzone.net/s/FpWTPSHS5C2YBpM/download/install.sh -o install.sh
curl -fsSL https://cloud.antimatterzone.net/s/5ikTrqTCSdSoPjq/download/server.cfg -o server.cfg

# Verify download success
if [ ! -f entrypoint.sh ] || [ ! -f install.sh ] || [ ! -f server.cfg ]; then
    echo "[!] Download failed. Aborting installation."
    exit 1
fi

chmod +x entrypoint.sh install.sh

# Run main install script
bash ./install.sh

# Cleanup temporary files
rm -f /home/container/*.tmp || true

echo "[âœ”] Darkmatter Servers FiveM install completed successfully."

variables.name: FiveM License Key
variables.description: Required: Get your license key at https://keymaster.fivem.net/. Needed to authenticate your server.

variables.name: Steam Web API Key
variables.description: Optional: Steam API key from https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey. Used for Steam authentication (player features).

variables.name: OneSync State
variables.description: Enable OneSync technology. Set to 'on' (recommended) for large player slots. Values: on, off, legacy. More at https://docs.fivem.net/docs/server-manual/onesync/

variables.name: Game Build
variables.description: Specific GTA V game build number to force (example: 2699 for latest). Leave blank for automatic. List of builds: https://docs.fivem.net/docs/server-manual/game-build/

variables.name: FiveM Version
variables.description: Which FiveM artifact version to install: 'recommended', 'latest', or exact build ID (e.g. 6482).

variables.name: Project Name
variables.description: Displayed name of your server on the FiveM server list. Example: 'Darkmatter RP'.

variables.name: Project Description
variables.description: Short description shown on FiveM server browser. Example: 'Welcome to Darkmatter City!'

variables.name: Enable txAdmin
variables.description: Enable txAdmin web panel for server management (1 = enable, 0 = disable). Learn more at https://docs.fivem.net/docs/server-manual/txadmin/

variables.name: txAdmin Port
variables.description: Port used by txAdmin panel. Default: 40120. Make sure it's open in your firewall settings.

variables.name: FiveM Game Port
variables.description: Primary FiveM port (TCP/UDP) where players connect. Default: 30120.

variables.name: Server Hostname
variables.description: The visible hostname in FiveM server list. Example: '[US] Darkmatter RP - Serious RP'.

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Max number of players allowed on server. Adjust carefully if you modify OneSync settings.

variables.name: RCON Password
variables.description: Password for remote server console access (optional). Useful for tools like BattleMetrics.
